definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display

sentences.english: Planning, Preparation and Implementation of High Quality Food& Beverage Products and Set-up's in all Areas and ?Restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 計劃和準備執行高質量的食品和擺設在指定的餐廳。

sentences.english: Review reserved tables and names of such; follow up on special arrangements for pre-assigned tables according to standards.
sentences.chinese: 查抄預定的桌子環境和客人姓名，跟進特別的擺設。

sentences.english: Oh, look at this clothing store for children.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，看這家兒童服裝店的擺設。

sentences.english: So Laban brought together all the people of the place and gave a feast.
sentences.chinese: 拉班就擺設筵席，請齊了那地方的衆人。

sentences.english: She loitered along the street, looking into all the show windows.
sentences.chinese: 她沿街閒逛，看所有的櫥窗擺設。

sentences.english: They spoke against God, saying, 'Can God spread a table in the desert?
sentences.chinese: 並且妄論神，說，神在曠野豈能擺設筵席嗎？

sentences.english: He remembers the layout of the room and what the eggcup looks like.
sentences.chinese: 它記得房間的擺設和蛋杯的樣子。

sentences.english: She's extremely house-proud, keeping all the things hanging on the wall in high tastes.
sentences.chinese: 她特別講究家裏的擺設，牆上掛的東西都是很考究的。

sentences.english: All the arrangements should be completed prior to your departure.
sentences.chinese: 在你登程之前，應該作好全部的擺設。

sentences.english: Actually the fire control devices are just displays in most public places.
sentences.chinese: 其實在很多地方，消防器材都只是個擺設。

sentences.english: "Relax", said the night-man, " We are programmed to receive.
sentences.chinese: “放鬆點，”值夜的說到，“咱們擺設好了接收。

sentences.english: Baltasar the king made a great feast for a thousand of his nobles: and every one drank according to his age.
sentences.chinese: 貝耳沙匝王爲大員千人擺設了盛筵，並與千人宴飲。

sentences.english: Shut off power fair conditionersing working and servicing on electrical equipment or circuits.
sentences.chinese: 在維修保養電器設置裝備擺設之前，必需先切斷電源。

sentences.english: While this was going on, Queen Vashti was giving a banquet for the officials' wives.
sentences.chinese: 在這期間，王后也爲官員的夫人們擺設筵席。

sentences.english: Neither would he allow her to use the refrigerator that was standing in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 他也從不允許母親使用那擺設在廚房裏的冰箱。

sentences.english: Zhong-loving pink, bedroom walls, furnishings have been my uniform color.
sentences.chinese: 忠愛粉色，臥室牆壁，擺設都被我統一色系。
